description: Generated when a ping test is determined to have failed
when the corresponding shePingCtlTrapGeneration object is
set to testFailure(1). In this instance
shePingCtlTrapTestFailureFilter should specify the number of
probes in a test required to have failed in order to
consider the test as failed.
Read shePingResultsTable for further details.
The time stamp of the last command (end of command).
variables.name: SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteControlTimeStamp

description: Reflects the operational state of a shePingCtlEntry:
enabled(1) - Test is active.
disabled(2) - Test has stopped.
completed(3) - Test is completed.
variables.name: SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::shePingResultsOperStatus

description: Generated at the completion of a ping test when the
corresponding shePingCtlTrapGeneration object has the
testCompletion(2) bit set.
Read shePingResultsTable for further details.
The time stamp of the last command (end of command).
variables.name: SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteControlTimeStamp

description: Reflects the operational state of a shePingCtlEntry:
enabled(1) - Test is active.
disabled(2) - Test has stopped.
completed(3) - Test is completed.
variables.name: SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::shePingResultsOperStatus

description: Could not determine the path to a target.
Read sheTraceRouteResultsTable for further details.
The time stamp of the last command (end of command).
variables.name: SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteControlTimeStamp

description: Reflects the operational state of an sheTraceRouteCtlEntry:
enabled(1) - Test is active.
disabled(2) - Test has stopped.
completed(3) - Test is completed.
variables.name: SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheTraceRouteResultsOperStatus

description: The path to a target has just been determined.
Read sheTraceRouteResultsTable for further details.
The time stamp of the last command (end of command).
variables.name: SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteControlTimeStamp

description: Reflects the operational state of an sheTraceRouteCtlEntry:
enabled(1) - Test is active.
disabled(2) - Test has stopped.
completed(3) - Test is completed.
variables.name: SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheTraceRouteResultsOperStatus

description: configuration notification
The time stamp of the last command (end of command).
variables.name: SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteControlTimeStamp

description: The maximum number of concurrent active ping requests
that are allowed within an agent implementation. A value
of 0 for this object implies that there is no limit for
the number of concurrent active requests in effect.
The limit applies only to new requests being activated.
When a new value is set, the agent will continue processing
all the requests already active, even if their number
exceed the limit just imposed.
variables.name: SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::shePingMaxConcurrentRequests

description: configuration notification

event.Summary: MPLS trace route basic settings modified

description: The time stamp of the last command (end of command).
variables.name: SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteControlTimeStamp

description: The maximum number of concurrent active traceroute requests
that are allowed within an agent implementation. A value
of 0 for this object implies that there is no limit for
the number of concurrent active requests in effect.
The limit applies only to new requests being activated.
When a new value is set, the agent will continue processing
all the requests already active, even if their number
exceed the limit just imposed.
variables.name: SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheTracerouteMaxConcurrentRequests

description: configuration notification for start of a new test
The time stamp of the last command (end of command).
variables.name: SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteControlTimeStamp

description: Identify the type of configured probe.
pingProbe (1)
traceRouteProbe (2)
Will be set during probe create command and could never be modified!
variables.name: SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlProbe

description: configuration notification

event.Summary: MPLS ping probe created for destination ip $v9

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingProbeCreated SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteControlTimeStamp u 9999 SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlProbe i 1 SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlOperationType i 1 SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlAddress s EXAMPLE SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlAddrPfxLen u 0 SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlPwIndex u 0 SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlMode i 1 SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlFlagsEnabled i 1 SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlDestAddress s EXAMPLE SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlSourceAddress s EXAMPLE SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlTtl u 1 SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlDescr s EXAMPLE SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlTimeOut u 1 SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlPingRepeat u 5 SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlPingInterval u 9999 SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlExpliciteNullForced i 1 SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlMaxHistoryRows u 9999 SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlTrapGeneration b 0

description: The time stamp of the last command (end of command).
variables.name: SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteControlTimeStamp

description: Identify the type of configured probe.
pingProbe (1)
traceRouteProbe (2)
Will be set during probe create command and could never be modified!
variables.name: SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlProbe

description: Dependent on the type of operation the following parameters have to be set alternatively:
ipv4 -> CtlAddress / CtlAddessPfx -> IPv4 prefix address
ldp -> CtlAddress / CtlAddressPfx -> LDP IPv4 FEC prefix address
pw -> CtlPwIndex -> identify the pw by index -> PW-STD-MIB: PwIndex
icmp -> CtlAddress / CtlAddressPfx -> LDP IPv4 FEC prefix address
-> only supported for traceroute probes
variables.name: SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlOperationType

description: Depending on the operationType this parameter specify a ipv4 address or a ipv4 FEC address.
Only valid for CtlOperationTypes = 'ipv4' or 'ldp' or 'icmp'.
variables.name: SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlAddress

description: Indicates the number of leading one bits that form the mask to be logical-ANDed
with the address.
Only valid for CtlOperationTypes = 'ipv4' or 'ldp'.
variables.name: SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlAddrPfxLen

description: This parameter identify the corresponding pw in pwTable of PW-STD-MIB by its index pwIndex.
Only valid for CtlOperationTypes = 'pw'.
variables.name: SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlPwIndex

description: Reply modes defined.
udpPacket(1) -> Reply with IP UDP packet (default)
udpPacketwithRouterAlert(2) -> Reply with IP UDP packet with router alert
controlChannel(3) -> Reply via application level control channel -> Only valid for CtlOperationTypes = 'pw' (prefered mode in this case).
Only valid for CtlOperationTypes = 'ipv4' or 'ldp' or 'pw'.
variables.name: SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlMode

description: Received LSR must do an FEC stack validation.
Only valid for CtlOperationTypes = 'ipv4' or 'ldp' or 'pw'.
variables.name: SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlFlagsEnabled

description: Destination IPv4 address field in the UPD packet. Must be from
the range 127/8 excluding the default local loopback address.
Only valid for CtlOperationTypes = 'ipv4'.
variables.name: SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlDestAddress

description: Source IPv4 address field in the UPD packet. Optional. Default is the router ID.
Only valid for CtlOperationTypes = 'ipv4'.
variables.name: SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlSourceAddress

description: Packet time-to-live value.
This setting influence the lsp-label
NOTE:
Only valid for ping probe configuration!
variables.name: SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlTtl

description: The purpose of this object is to provide a descriptive name of the remote test.
variables.name: SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlDescr

description: Time to wait, in seconds, before rejecting the sent probe as a failure.
variables.name: SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlTimeOut

description: Number of ping packets to be sent.
NOTE:
Only valid for ping probe configuration!
variables.name: SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlPingRepeat

description: Interval, in milliseconds, between MPLS ping packets.
NOTE:
Only valid for ping probe configuration!
variables.name: SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlPingInterval

description: Force Explicit NULL label.
Only valid for CtlOperationTypes = 'ipv4' or 'ldp' or 'pw'.
variables.name: SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlExpliciteNullForced

description: The maximum number of corresponding entries allowed in the corresponding ProbeHistoryTable.
An implementation of this MIB will remove the oldest corresponding entry in the
ProbeHistoryTable to allow the addition of an new entry once the number of corresponding
rows in the ProbeHistoryTable reaches this value.
Old entries are not removed when a new test is started.
Entries are added to the ProbeHistoryTable until sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlMaxRows is reached before
entries begin to be removed.
A value of 0 for this object disables creation of ProbeHistoryTable entries.
variables.name: SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlMaxHistoryRows

description: The value of this object determines when and if to generate a notification for this entry:
probeFailure(0) - Generate a ProbeFailed notification (ping probe only).
testFailure(1) - Generate a TestFailed notification.
testCompleted(2) - Generate a TestCompleted notification.
pathChanged(3) - Generate a PathChange notification (traceroute probe only)
By default, no bits are set, indicating that none of the above options are selected.
variables.name: SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlTrapGeneration

description: configuration notification

event.Summary: MPLS trace route probe created for destination ip $v9

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsTraceRouteProbeCreated SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteControlTimeStamp u 9999 SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlProbe i 1 SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlOperationType i 1 SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlAddress s EXAMPLE SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlAddrPfxLen u 0 SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlPwIndex u 0 SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlMode i 1 SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlFlagsEnabled i 1 SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlDestAddress s EXAMPLE SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlSourceAddress s EXAMPLE SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlTimeOut u 1 SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlExpliciteNullForced i 1 SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlMaxHistoryRows u 9999 SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlTraceRouteCreateHopsEntries i 1 SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlTrapGeneration b 0

description: The time stamp of the last command (end of command).

description: The current path for a traceroute test is kept in the
sheTraceRouteHopsTable on a per hop basis when the value of
this object is true(1).
NOTE:
Only valid for traceroute probe configuration!
variables.name: SHE-MPLS-PING-TRACEROUTE-MIB::sheMplsPingTraceRouteCtlTraceRouteCreateHopsEntries

description: The value of this object determines when and if to generate a notification for this entry:
probeFailure(0) - Generate a ProbeFailed notification (ping probe only).
testFailure(1) - Generate a TestFailed notification.
testCompleted(2) - Generate a TestCompleted notification.
pathChanged(3) - Generate a PathChange notification (traceroute probe only)
By default, no bits are set, indicating that none of the above options are selected.
